          <title>
            <string language="en">A Tuning fork</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Stimmgabel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un diapason</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma forquilha ajustando</string>

          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation illustrating the sound waves emitted from a tuning fork.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation illustrant les vagues saines émises

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que ilustra las ondas acústicas 
emitidas de un diapasón.</string>
